item.title: coffee
item.description:
This page contains coffee that I enjoy from various places. I currently do not drink much coffee, so this page will be populated slowly.

I do eventually want to make my own coffee. My father has an espresso machine which I have used occasionally, so when I have more expendable time and money I may look into it.

blue bottle

  • iced NOLA

peet’s

  • iced vanilla latte + extra shot

starbucks

  • peppermint mocha
  • cold brew + chocolate (peppermint) cold foam
